articles.title: Hedge Funds Hurt by Oil's Dip in First Half Pile Back Into Crude - Bloomberg
articles.description: After being burned by crude’s slump in the first half of 2023, hedge funds are rushing back into the oil market with their most bullish wagers in more than a year.
articles.content:
